definitions.definition: (usually in the plural) Husked but unground oats.
(usually in the plural) Coarsely ground corn or hominy used as porridge.
Apparently only in grit one's teeth: to clench, particularly in reaction to pain or anger.
definitions.example: He has a sleeping disorder and grits his teeth.

definitions.definition: To give forth a grating sound, like sand under the feet; to grate; to grind.
(usually in the plural) Husked but unground oats.
(usually in the plural) Coarsely ground corn or hominy used as porridge.
